events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for days, and I'm really worried about the delay.
The customer's message mentions a significant delay and tracking issues, so the case is classified under Delivery Delay for further handling.
The delivery support agent specialized in shipment inquiries has been assigned to this case to assist the customer with their shipping delay problem.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand how frustrating it is when your order hasn't arrived on time, and I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the name used during the purchase? This information will help me check the shipping status and any updates on your delivery.
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and the name on the order is Emily Johnson. I really hope this can be resolved soon because I need the item urgently.
Thank you for providing the details. I’ve contacted the courier with your order info and it appears there was a delay due to sorting issues. They expect delivery within the next 48 hours.
Thanks for the update and for following up with the courier. I appreciate you letting me know and look forward to receiving the package soon.
We are happy to confirm that your package was delivered successfully yesterday. Please get in touch if you have any further questions or concerns.
Just checking in to ensure everything is satisfactory with your order delivery and that you have received the item as expected.
Since your delivery was completed and you have no further concerns, we are closing this support ticket. Thank you for your patience and understanding throughout.
